abstract: Jet.com, the much-hyped new rival to Amazon and Costco, is dropping its membership fee three months after its introduction.
snippet: Jet.com, the much-hyped new rival to Amazon and Costco, is dropping its membership fee three months after its introduction.
lead_paragraph: Just three months after its introduction, Jet.com, the much-hyped rival to Amazon and Costco, has done a 180-degree turn in its business model by making its members-only shopping club freely accessible.

headline.main: An Amazon Rival, Jet.com, Eliminates Its Membership Fee
